channel.title: Problem with my non Safe zone please help :-)

item.title: Problem with my non Safe zone please help :-)
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

ok i scripted a part of the wildy to be a big safe zone but now i want a small pvp zone in it can someone help me with this i dont get errors it just doesnt let me pvp here if this isnt detailed ill spice it up by saying i have the nonsafe boolean and i set up the code wich lets me have a non safe zone in that area COORDSY 3350 - 3357 COORDSY - 3404 - 3412 and i want that small ammount of coords to be a pvp zone and the rest stay a safe zone can someone help me with my problem my code is set up like this

public booleans nonSafe() { if ((absX >= 3350 && absX <= 3357 && absY >= 3404 && absY <= 3412) ||heightLevel = 1){ return true; }else{ return false; } }

this is my custom code that i scripted if i have somthing i have to switch around please tell me iv been trying to make a scripted safe zone that i scripted and its a large area to have a small pvp zone ini the little dig site my home is the digsite where you do the digsite quest so if i have to change anything please do tell!.
ty for your time and patients

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with my non Safe zone please help :-)
